data.lyric:
[ti:How Do I Make You Love Me?]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]How Do I Make You Love Me? - The Weeknd
[00:02.59]Lyrics by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin/Axel Hedfors/Steve Angello/Sebastian Ingrosso
[00:05.19]Composed by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin/Axel Hedfors/Steve Angello/Sebastian Ingrosso
[00:07.79]We're going back in time
[00:09.71]I'd like to see you try
[00:11.73]Unpacking thoughts through tunnels in your mind
[00:14.44]
[00:15.59]I'll fix you mushroom tea
[00:17.64]And cross the restless sea
[00:19.63]Release yourself to escape reality
[00:22.48]
[00:23.57]It doesn't phase you
[00:25.59]I need a breakthrough
[00:27.59]I only want what's right in front of me
[00:30.44]
[00:31.53]It's quite unusual
[00:33.51]Seeking approval
[00:35.53]Begging for it desperately
[00:38.50]I said
[00:39.15]
[00:55.70]How do I make you love me
[00:58.52]
[01:00.01]How do I make you fall for me
[01:02.86]
[01:03.46]How do I make you want me
[01:06.57]
[01:07.71]And make it last eternally
[01:10.74]
[01:11.43]How do I make you love me
[01:14.43]Oh ah
[01:15.76]How do I make you fall for me
[01:18.66]
[01:19.41]How do I make you want me
[01:22.68]Oh ah
[01:23.67]And make it last eternally
[01:27.35]I can see the real you girl
[01:29.34]You don't have to hide
[01:31.10]Forget 'bout what your daddy said
[01:33.00]I'll teach you how to shine
[01:35.07]And all the things you tolerated
[01:37.23]Made you cold inside
[01:38.95]But I can light you up again
[01:40.86]Like embers of a fire
[01:42.94]It doesn't phase you
[01:44.92]I need a breakthrough
[01:46.89]I only want what's right in front of me
[01:49.80]
[01:50.91]It's quite unusual
[01:52.85]Seeking approval
[01:54.94]Begging for it desperately
[01:57.89]I said
[01:58.56]
[01:59.18]How do I make you love me
[02:02.01]
[02:03.40]How do I make you fall for me
[02:06.27]
[02:07.03]How do I make you want me
[02:10.17]
[02:11.17]And make it last eternally
[02:14.22]
[02:14.90]How do I make you love me
[02:17.88]Oh ah
[02:19.19]How do I make you fall for me
[02:22.16]
[02:22.97]How do I make you want me
[02:26.06]Oh ah
[02:27.18]And make it last eternally
data.trans:
[ti:How Do I Make You Love Me?]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.59]//
[00:05.19]//
[00:07.79]我们要回到过去
[00:09.71]我想看你为我努力
[00:11.73]通过你大脑中的隧道解放你的思想
[00:14.44]
[00:15.59]我会给你倒上致幻的蘑菇茶
[00:17.64]穿过永不平静的大海
[00:19.63]让你释放自己 逃离现实
[00:22.48]
[00:23.57]这不能限制你
[00:25.59]我需要突破
[00:27.59]我只希望自己做出的选择都是对的
[00:30.44]
[00:31.53]这是如此与众不同
[00:33.51]寻求认同
[00:35.53]拼命地乞求
[00:38.50]我问过你
[00:39.15]
[00:55.70]我要如何才能让你爱上我
[00:58.52]
[01:00.01]我要如何才能让你为我坠入爱河
[01:02.86]
[01:03.46]我要如何才能让你对我心生渴求
[01:06.57]
[01:07.71]让这份爱永远持续下去
[01:10.74]
[01:11.43]我要如何才能让你爱上我
[01:14.43]//
[01:15.76]我要如何才能让你为我坠入爱河
[01:18.66]
[01:19.41]我要如何才能让你对我心生渴求
[01:22.68]//
[01:23.67]让这份爱永远持续下去
[01:27.35]我能够看到真实的你 女孩
[01:29.34]你无需在我面前掩饰自己
[01:31.10]忘记你父亲曾经说过的话吧
[01:33.00]我会教会你如何绽放自己的光芒
[01:35.07]你所忍受的那些事情
[01:37.23]让你内心变得冰冷
[01:38.95]但我能再次点燃你
[01:40.86]就像火焰燃烧后的余烬
[01:42.94]这不能限制你
[01:44.92]我需要突破
[01:46.89]我只希望自己做出的选择都是对的
[01:49.80]
[01:50.91]这是如此与众不同
[01:52.85]寻求认同
[01:54.94]绝望地乞求
[01:57.89]我问过你
[01:58.56]
[01:59.18]我要如何才能让你爱上我
[02:02.01]
[02:03.40]我要如何才能让你为我坠入爱河
[02:06.27]
[02:07.03]我要如何才能让你对我心生渴求
[02:10.17]
[02:11.17]让这份爱永远持续下去
[02:14.22]
[02:14.90]我要如何才能让你爱上我
[02:17.88]//
[02:19.19]我要如何才能让你为我坠入爱河
[02:22.16]
[02:22.97]我要如何才能让你对我心生渴求
[02:26.06]//
[02:27.18]让这份爱永远持续下去
